def_cn: (某些基督教新教教派和摩门教派的)教堂，礼拜堂
def_en: A tabernacle is a church used by certain Christian Protestant groups and by Mormons.

def_cn: (存放古代犹太人圣典的)圣幕，会幕
def_en: The Tabernacle was a small tent which contained the most holy writings of the ancient Jews and which they took with them when they were travelling.
